description: ViterbiDecoder can decode the highest scoring sequence of tags, it should only be used at test time.

params.name: transitions
params.description: The transition matrix.  Its dtype is float32 and has a shape of [num_tags, num_tags].

params.name: with_start_stop_tag
params.description: If set to True, the last row and the last column of transitions will be considered as start tag,the penultimate row and the penultimate column of transitions will be considered as stop tag.Else, all the rows and columns will be considered as the real tag. Defaults to None.
